pr_title: [lcn] add workaround for dynamic text firmware bug

timeline.message:
[lcn] add workaround for dynamic text firmware bug

Some LCN-GTxD don't display the text if it fits exactly in one chunk (12 bytes). Observed with GT10D 8.0.

Closes #9208

Signed-off-by: Fabian Wolter <github@fabian-wolter.de>

timeline.bodyText: The default charset varies from system to system so it is better to specify it yourself instead of using the default.
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText: ...I have no idea why I didn't notice that.
replies.author: cpmeister
